name: Fuu3's Fuun Journey
summary: Fuu3's Fuun Journey is a 2D platformer that stars the titular Fuu3 on an adventure he’s clearly not ready for, but he’s gonna do it. Someone has to! Joined with his friends Fuu6 and Fuu9, he must make his way through weird and unknown locations in order to stop the nefarious Minus3 and his dastardly team from finding and controlling the remaining paloomanium, an element thought to grant the user powers beyond reality. Will you have the upper hand? Or will you fail and suffer under the might of Minus3? Only one way to find out: BE THERE OR BE SQUARE!
